original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 7. Abhisamayantarāyakarapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, idha yo koci gihī pārājikaṁ ajjhāpanno bhaveyya, so aparena samayena
analyzed: bhante nāgasena idha yaḥ koci gihī pārājikam ajjhāpannaḥ bhaveyya saḥ aparena samayena

original: pabbājeyya, attanāpi so na jāneyya ‘gihipārājikaṁ ajjhāpannosmī’ti, napi tassa añño
analyzed: pabbājeyya attanā api saḥ na jāneyya gihi pārājikam ajjhāpannaḥ asmi iti na pi tassa aññaḥ

original: koci ācikkheyya ‘gihipārājikaṁ ajjhāpannosī’ti.
analyzed: koci ācikkheyya gihi pārājikam ajjhāpanno asi iti

original: So ca tathattāya paṭipajjeyya, api nu tassa dhammābhisamayo bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: saḥ ca tathattāya paṭipajjeyya api nu tassa dhamma abhisamayaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, mahārājā”ti.
analyzed: na hi mahā rājāti

original: “Kena, bhante, kāraṇenā”ti?
analyzed: kena bhante kāraṇena ati

original: “Yo tassa hetu dhammābhisamayāya, so tassa samucchinno, tasmā dhammābhisamayo na bhavatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ tassa hetu dhamma abhisamayāya so tassa samucchinnaḥ tasmā dhamma abhisamayaḥ na bhavati iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, tumhe bhaṇatha—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘jānantassa kukkuccaṁ hoti, kukkucce sati āvaraṇaṁ hoti, āvaṭe citte dhammābhisamayo na hotī’ti.
analyzed: jānantassa kukkuccam hoti kukkucce sati āvaraṇam hoti āvaṭe citte dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: Imassa pana ajānantassa akukkuccajātassa santacittassa viharato kena kāraṇena dhammābhisamayo na hoti, visamena visameneso pañho gacchati, cintetvā visajjethā”ti.
analyzed: imassa pana a jānantassa a kukkucca jātassa santa cittassa viharato kena kāraṇena dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti visamena visamena iso pañhaḥ gacchati cintetvā visajjetha ati

original: “Ruhati, mahārāja, sukaṭṭhe sukalale maṇḍakhette sāradaṁ sukhasayitaṁ bījan”ti?
analyzed: ruhati mahā rāja su kaṭṭhe su kalale maṇḍa khette sāradam sukha sayitam bījanti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Api nu, mahārāja, taññeva bījaṁ ghanaselasilātale ruheyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu mahā rāja tañca iva bījam ghanasela silā tale ruheyyāti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kissa pana, mahārāja, taññeva bījaṁ kalale ruhati, kissa ghanasele na ruhatī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana mahā rāja taññeva bījam kalale ruhati kissa ghana sele na ruhati iti

original: “Natthi, bhante, tassa bījassa ruhanāya ghanasele hetu, ahetunā bījaṁ na ruhatī”ti.
analyzed: natthi bhante tassa bījassa ruhanāya ghana sele hetu ahetunā bījam na ruhati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yena hetunā tassa dhammābhisamayo bhaveyya, so tassa hetu samucchinno, ahetunā dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yena hetunā tassa dhamma abhisamayaḥ bhaveyya saḥ tassa hetu samucchinnaḥ ahetunā dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarā pathaviyā ṭhānamupagacchanti, api nu, mahārāja, teyeva daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarā gagane ṭhānamupagacchantī”ti?
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja daṇḍa leḍḍula guḷa muggarā pathaviyāḥ ṭhānam upagacchanti api nu mahā rāja teyā iva daṇḍa leḍḍula guḷa muggarāḥ gagane ṭhānam upagacchanti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kiṁ panettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena teyeva daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarā pathaviyā ṭhānamupagacchanti, kena kāraṇena gagane na tiṭṭhantī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana ittha mahā rāja kāraṇa yena kāraṇena teya eva daṇḍa leḍḍu laguḷa muggarā pathaviyāḥ ṭhānam upagacchanti kena kāraṇena gagane na tiṭṭhanti iti

original: “Natthi, bhante, tesaṁ daṇḍaleḍḍulaguḷamuggarānaṁ patiṭṭhānāya ākāse hetu, ahetunā na tiṭṭhantī”ti.
analyzed: natthi bhante tesam daṇḍa leḍḍu laguḷa muggarānam patiṭṭhānāya ākāse hetu ahetunā na tiṭṭhanti iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghāte ahetunā abhisamayo na hotīti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tassa tena dosena abhisamaya hetu samucchinnaḥ hetu samugghāte ahetunā abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, thale aggi jalati, api nu kho, mahārāja, soyeva aggi udake jalatī”ti?
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja thale aggi jalati api nu khalu mahā rāja soyā iva aggi udake jalati iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kiṁ panettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena soyeva aggi thale jalati, kena kāraṇena udake na jalatī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana itthā mahā rāja kāraṇa yena kāraṇena soyā iva aggi thale jalati kena kāraṇena udake na jalati iti

original: “Natthi, bhante, aggissa jalanāya udake hetu, ahetunā na jalatī”ti.
analyzed: natthi bhante aggissa jalanāya udake hetu ahetunā na jalati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghāte ahetunā dhammābhisamayo na hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tassa tena dosena abhisamaya hetu samucchinnaḥ hetu samugghāte ahetunā dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, punapetaṁ atthaṁ cintehi, na me tattha cittasaññatti bhavati, ajānantassa asati kukkucce āvaraṇaṁ hotīti, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehī”ti.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena punapetam attham cintehi na me tattha citta saññatti bhavati a jānantassa asati kukkucce āvaraṇam hoti iti kāraṇena mama saññāpehi iti

original: “Api nu, mahārāja, visaṁ halāhalaṁ ajānantena khāyitaṁ jīvitaṁ haratī”ti?
analyzed: api nu mahā rāja visam halāhalam a jānantena khāyitam jīvitam harati iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ajānantenapi kataṁ pāpaṁ abhisamayantarāyakaraṁ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja a jānantena api katam pāpam abhisamaya antarāya karam

original: Api nu, mahārāja, aggi ajānitvā akkamantaṁ ḍahatī”ti?
analyzed: api nu mahā rāja aggi a jānitvā akkamantam ḍahati iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ajānantenapi kataṁ pāpaṁ abhisamayantarāyakaraṁ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja a jānantena api katam pāpam abhisamaya antarāya karam

original: Api nu, mahārāja, ajānantaṁ āsīviso ḍaṁsitvā jīvitaṁ haratī”ti?
analyzed: api nu mahā rāja a jānantam āsīvisaḥ ḍasitvā jīvitam harati iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ajānantenapi kataṁ pāpaṁ abhisamayantarāyakaraṁ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja a jānantena api katam pāpam abhisamaya antarāya karam

original: Nanu, mahārāja, kāliṅgarājā samaṇakolañño sattaratanaparikiṇṇo hatthiratanamabhiruyha
analyzed: nanu mahā rāja kāliṅga rājā samaṇa kolaññaḥ satta ratana parikiṇṇaḥ hatthi ratanam abhiruyha

original: kuladassanāya gacchanto ajānantopi nāsakkhi bodhimaṇḍassa uparito gantuṁ, idamettha,
analyzed: kula dassanāya gacchantaḥ a jānantaḥ api nā asakkhi bodhimaṇḍassa uparitas gantu idam ettha

original: mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena ajānantenapi kataṁ pāpaṁ abhisamayantarāyakaraṁ hotī”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja kāraṇa yena kāraṇena a jānantena api katam pāpam abhisamaya antarāya karam iti

original: “Jinabhāsitaṁ, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇaṁ na sakkā paṭikkosituṁ, esovetassa attho tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: jina bhāsita bhante nāgasena kāraṇam na sakkā paṭikkositu esaḥ uva etassa attho tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Abhisamayantarāyakarapañho sattamo.
analyzed: abhisamaya antarāya kara pañho sattamaḥ
